body: Classic fallen to evil story, but would love to see it with longer story like something in lighter ero manga with plot :D | For the lore part (p19-20), the Dragon King came down to the world and give intelligence to living being. To the apes, he even shared his blood, so the apes holds a fragment of magical power in them. The apes, who now calls their race as human, multiply and eventually raised their weapon against the Dragon King, whom they now call Demon King. At least that's the lore from the dragon's side, no story from human's side.
